transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Pranam sir Keshav Handicraft se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji main Rahul baat kar raha IndiaMART se aapka account manager.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Sir main aapko WhatsApp pe lead share kar raha hun woh kya response de rahe hain uske aap thoda bataiye mujhe?
Customer: Koi response nahi hai koi bhi order kabhi koi bhi ek bhi customer kaam ka koi bhi nahi aa raha aap jo bhej rahe ho usme hamare kaam ka ek bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Jo jo maine aapko WhatsApp pe bhai ji share ki thi unke kya keh rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Sir aise grahak hain jo koi matlab maal lene wale hain hi nahi ek bhi jo aap bhej rahe ho unme se koi maal lene wala ek bhi ready nahi ho raha hai batao ab kya kare batao.
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir yeh yeh ek baat hai sir jo maine aapko lead share ki thi na woh aapne consume hi nahi kari sir.
Customer: Are sahab kitna check kare isi me lage rahe koi matlab dekh lete hain lagatar continue dekh rahe hain uske baad me dekhna hi band kar diya hum dekh ke kya kare kuch response dikhe ya kuch dikhe jab to aadmi kaam karne ka kuch mann bhi karta hai dekhenge dusra kaam me time denge na isme time dene se kya fayda hai phir batao bhai time usme do jisme kuch mile.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir.
Customer: Aap bhi samajhte ho.
Executive: Iska bhi output aapko milega main yeh nahi keh raha aap sir ko pura din dena hai thoda bahut time dena hai lekin lekin isme agar time de de rahe hain phir bhi agar kuch response nahi hai to kya matlab hai dene se?
Customer: Aap bhi samajhte ho is baat ko ki hum humne abhi dekhna dekhna hi band kar diya humne to main kaha dekhna hi band kar do ab jab koi kaam hi nahi aa raha hum to yeh soch rahe hain chalo hamare koi baat nahi 35000 doob rahe hain woh woh gaye to aur kya kare batao.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Ab sir main aapko baar baar bol raha hun baar baar bol raha hun ki aapke aapke pass grahak aise de rahe hain ki ji kisi ka koi nahi bechta jabki aap manufacturer woh tab nahi bech pa rahe hain trading wala to kya bech payega main cheez to yeh hai na.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir main samajh pa raha hun.
Customer: Jai jai shri ram sir yeh jo aapko na pichle mahine haan boliye are sir hamare jaise koi cheez ₹100 ki paida woh ghar me ban rahi hai agar hum usko ₹115 me ₹120 me bech rahe hain to bhi koi lene ke liye tayar nahi ho raha to batao phir usse badhiya to offline me hamare quantity bik raha hai order bhej maal jata hi hai quantity me.
Executive: Matlab sir jo aap matlab jo bhi buyleads consume kar rahe hain usse matlab koi bhi client kuch response nahi de raha yeh keh rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir jo aapko direct enquiry aisa dete ho buyer hi aise dete ho aap to kya kare batao sir.
Customer: Sir jo aapko direct enquiry ja rahi hai unse kya keh rahe hain sir?
Executive: Are sir are sir ek to main bata du aapko hamare photography bhi sahi nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Hum kisi ko bhejenge wohi jo jo pehle shuru me ja rahi thi wohi wohi ja rahi hai haan main dekh lo iska kurti wohi aa rahe hain to yeh cheeze hain ki eh uh matlab wohi photo aap koi designing woh nahi koi naya catalog hi nahi bana rahe ho catalog aapko bolte bolte saal bhar ho jayegi koi catalog hi achcha achche dhang se tayar nahi kar rahe to batao phir kaise kaam chalega.
Executive: Sir catalog ke aapke description yeh sab sare add ho gaye hain sir.
Customer: Are sir description to hue hain lekin dhang se nahi ho rahe hain kyuki hum bhi jaise kisi ko bhejte hain share karne hote grahak ko to wohi purane dhang se be dhang ke bane hue uski photography ja rahe hain to woh humko hi pasand nahi aa rahe to agle ko kaise pasand aayenge.
Executive: Sir isme na aise kuch kuch products ke na photos missing hai sir woh photos to aapne aapke apne end se hi dal payenge sir usme hum kya kar payenge aap bataiye sir baki description aur yeh hamare woh to woh to dekho meri baat suno jo humne humne to galti kar di na Delhi se jud ke aapne dhokhe se jud jod diya pehle woh Jaipur wala bech ke woh yahan se jod liya dhokhadhadi kar li ek tarike se hain kyuki pehle to yahan se bhej diya IndiaMART wale ko aur yahan se yahan se aake aur check leke aur woh apna kaam karke chullu seedha karke aur bach gaye jai ram ji ki ho gaya kaam pura to aapne bola mohanlal samjhayenge woh samjhe phir humne hamare samajh me aa gayi sari kahani ab bhai yeh yeh to inhone fraud kar rahe hain hum dusre din kahani samajh me aa gayi thi to yeh yeh to cheeze sir hum bhi aisi baat nahi business karte hain humko bhi pata hai to hum aise dimag kyu lagayenge jab ek baat ho jo kuch dikh hi nahi raha humko to hum kyu karenge bina faltu ke tension ka kaam kyu karenge.
Executive: Sir ek baat wohi keh raha hun isme na.
Customer: Tension ka kaam kyu karega jab agar business kar raha hai paise laga raha hai to phir tension ka kaam kyu karega aap bhi samajhte ho is baat ko.
Executive: Bilkul sir main samajh pa raha hun aap online zyada busy hai but sir koi ek aapke family koi person bhi hoga jo waise online handle kar sakta hai kyuki sir thoda sa time ispe lagta hai hume pura catalog yeh sab.
Customer: Are sir woh to kariye handle to kar rahe hain handle karke kya kare aadmi ko aadmi ka time waste aur ho jayega bhai aadmi na time waste hoga usse kya fayda hai batao ab.
Executive: Main sach batau na main sir.
Customer: Bilkul sir main samajh gaya calls wals hai woh to aap handle kar loge but main yeh bhi samajh gaya ki aap offline zyada busy hai online mera mera ek friend hai woh Jaipur se juda hua hai IndiaMART se hain unke pass aadmi aate rehte hain har do mahine me mahine me 15 din me jo bhi samasyaye sunte rehte hain unka nidhan hota hai unki samasyaye sari woh hoti hai hamari koi samasya ka koi nidhan hua nahi hua aaj tak hua hai.
Executive: Ek second matlab unpe physical visit karke jate hain aap yeh keh rahe hain?
Customer: Haan physical visit karte hain to aise aise thodi woh hoga to ab woh koi cheez hai hum bhi unko samjhate baith ke ab phone pe kya karenge batao aap phone pe to humko bhi pata hai online lekin online ka matlab dusri minute se to ek second sir aap hold kijiye main abhi usse confirm karta hun ek minute aap line pe rahiye sir.
Executive: Aur abhi.
Customer: To.
summary:
Concerns:

- No useful buyleads are being received.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of customers.

- Photography and catalog design are not up to par.

- Feels cheated by IndiaMART's business practices.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive suggested someone in family handle online.

- Executive put the call on hold to confirm something.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, photography, fraud, offline business
